title: Projects
subtitle: Things I've made trying to give back to the community.
description: Things I've made trying to give back to the community.
intro: I've worked on numerous small projects over the years, but only recently have I made some of them open source. If something piques your interest, feel free to check out the code and contribute your ideas for improvements.

projects.name: Cache Ninja
projects.description: In Ruby on Rails, association caching is tricky, but Cache Ninja turns it into a powerful tool, enabling users to redefine their experience.

projects.name: Ejabberd Client
projects.description: The Ejabberd HTTP Client gem streamlines Ruby-based communication with Ejabberd XMPP servers, making it easier and more efficient

projects.name: Simple Proxy
projects.description: This gem boosts developer productivity by tackling CORS restrictions, smoothing out the software development lifecycle, and speeding up processes for greater efficiency.

projects.name: GPT: Paul Graham's Essays
projects.description: This is a custom-gpt model trained on Paul Graham's essays. It's a fun way to interact with his essays and get a glimpse into the mind of a great thinker.
